resources.string: Find device might not work properly without permissions. Select all the listed permissions to be able to use all the features of Find device.
Your device is associated with an existing Xiaomi Account (%s). Connect to the network to verify the device.
Connect to the network to activate device
"Read and agree to the Xiaomi Cloud's Privacy Policy and User Agreement before you continue."

"Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your notes, photos and videos, recordings, and other items from system apps across all connected devices. Home screen layout backups will also be stored in Xiaomi Cloud. You'll be able to view all synced items on i.mi.com."
Storage is almost full. May not be able to sync photos.
Storage is full. Pausing cloud sync.
No items in the cloud yet
Upgrade to get up to %d TB of storage
Connect to Wi-Fi or insert a SIM card
Connect to WLAN or insert a SIM card
If you turn on sync, contacts uploaded from this device will be merged with the contacts stored in the cloud. Turn on sync anyway?
View Mi Canvas data on your tablet.
Allow %s to connect to the internet to be able to restore items
This account is also used on another device. Merge the items from multiple apps (including %1$s and %2$s) with the items on this device?
This account is also used on another device. Merge the items from %s with the items on this device?
This account is also used on another device. Merge the items from %1$s and %2$s with the items on this device?
Items from multiple sources, including %1$s and %2$s, are stored in Xiaomi Cloud. Sync and merge them with the items on this device?
Items from multiple sources, including %1$s and %2$s, are stored in Xiaomi Cloud. Sync and merge them with the items on this device?
Items from %s are stored in Xiaomi Cloud. Sync and merge them with the items on this device?
Items from %s are stored in Xiaomi Cloud. Sync and merge them with the items on this device?
Items from %1$s and %2$s are stored in Xiaomi Cloud. Sync and merge them with the items on this device?
Items from %1$s and %2$s are stored in Xiaomi Cloud. Sync and merge them with the items on this device?
"Couldn't get info. Try again in 3-5 days."

"First activation is registered when a device connects to the network (including but not limited to Wi-Fi and mobile networks) for the first time. It normally takes a while to register first activation, so it's better to wait for 3-5 days after connecting to the network before checking activation status.

Device activation is the main factor in determining the validity period of our extended warranty. Check our Return, Exchange, and Repair Policy for more details.

Feel free to call our customer support hotline if you have any questions: 400-100-5678."

"First activation is registered when a device connects to the network (including but not limited to WLAN and mobile networks) for the first time. It normally takes a while to register first activation, so it's better to wait for 3-5 days after connecting to the network before checking activation status.

Device activation is the main factor in determining the validity period of our extended warranty. Check our Return, Exchange, and Repair Policy for more details.

Feel free to call our customer support hotline if you have any questions: 400-100-5678."
"Couldn't get info. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
Upgrade your storage plan to continue syncing items.
Go to i.mi.com to download synced photos and videos to your device.
Turn on screen lock for this device to be able to update your security passkey.

"Xiaomi Cloud offers Advanced data protection. This feature uses end-to-end encryption to ensure that your data can only be accessed on trusted devices. No one else, including Xiaomi, can access your encrypted data. "
After updating this security passkey, the old one will become invalid. Update now?

"Once you remove this device from your Xiaomi Account, it will be signed out and you won't be able to use Xiaomi Cloud services, search, and other account-related features on it until you sign in again."

"This device doesn't support Advanced data protection, so you won't be able to sign in to your account if you turn this feature on. Update this device to Xiaomi HyperOS 2 to be able to sign in to your account."
"Couldn't sign out. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"Couldn't sign out. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"These devices haven't yet been verified as trusted devices. Sign out of your Xiaomi Account on these devices before turning on Advanced data protection. "
Remove this device from your account before turning on Advanced data protection
Update to Xiaomi HyperOS 2 or later
"Devices signed out of your Xiaomi Account won't be able to use Xiaomi Cloud and other related services until they sign in again."
Tap here to remove this device
Data protected by this feature will no longer support end-to-end encryption, and Advanced data protection will be turned off on all devices.
"When a device is signed out, Advanced data protection is turned off automatically. This won't affect other devices. When you sign back in, you'll need to turn this feature on again."
"This feature isn't supported on this device."
"This feature isn't supported in your region."
"Couldn't initialize. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
"This environment isn't secure. Try using a different device."

"You're about to sign out of the last currently connected device associated with your Xiaomi Account. You'll need to use a screen lock or security passkey in order to sign in again and access your data stored in the cloud. Alternatively, tap \"Turn off\" below to turn off Advanced data protection."
The server is busy. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"You haven't added a recovery phone. If you forget your password, you won't be able to sign in. Add a recovery phone to be able to retrieve your password."
"Couldn't turn off this feature. Wait a minute or two and try again."
This feature has been turned off on all devices that were previously using it. Data protected by this feature no longer supports end-to-end encryption.
"Couldn't turn on this feature. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Advanced data protection is turned on for this device. Make sure to keep your recovery methods up to date.
"Use security passkey if you aren't able to use other recovery methods"
Keep the security key on another device or print it out to ensure that it can still be used if you lose access to this device.
"You can gain access to your cloud data via your device's screen lock or by sending a verification code. You can add an additional recovery method by setting up a security passkey."
Turn on screen lock for this device to be able to use Advanced data protection.
Sign in to use Xiaomi Cloud
An unknown error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Too many attempts to reset passcode
Too many unsuccessful attempts. Try again in %s.
Too many unsuccessful attempts. Try again in %s.
Our servers are busy. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Sign in to your Xiaomi Account again
"This feature isn't supported on this device"
"Describe the issues you've encountered here. If you're giving suggestions, we'd appreciate more details!"
If you lose your device, you can go to <font color=#0097FF>%s</font> to locate, lock, or reset it. You can turn this feature on or off anytime in Settings.
"By turning on Find device, you're agreeing to the "Xiaomi Cloud Privacy Policy. To withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy, turn off this feature.
"Couldn't perform the operation due to RPC error."
"Tap \"Grant\" to grant the permissions you've selected."

"Welcome to Find device! You can use this app to locate, track, and lock your device when it's missing. You can also anonymously help others locate their Xiaomi devices. This app requires the following permissions to work normally:"
"With Find device, you can locate, track, and lock your device when it's missing. This app requires the following permissions to work normally:"
"Turn on to locate and track your device or clear its data remotely. You can also anonymously help others locate their Xiaomi devices."
Turn on to locate and track your device or clear its data remotely
For accessing your location via SMS when not connected to the network
"For accessing phone number in order to locate this device when it isn't connected to the internet"
"For locating this device when it isn't connected to the internet"
"Lock your device remotely if it's lost"
Not enough storage space left in the cloud. Upgrade your storage plan to sync photos and videos.
"Cloud storage is insufficient. Can't save photos."
"Gallery items can no longer be synced to Xiaomi Cloud. We recommend transferring photos and videos that you've synced with the cloud to Google Photos and using their services to back up your items."
Transfer synced photos and videos to Google Photos
Notice of termination of Xiaomi Cloud sync for Gallery items and transfer to Google Photos

"Gallery items can no longer be synced to Xiaomi Cloud. We recommend transferring photos and videos that you've synced with the cloud to Google Photos, or visiting i.mi.com to download synced photos and videos to your device. Transfer and download services will be available until %s, at which time all Gallery items synced to your Xiaomi Cloud account will be permanently deleted."
"This feature isn't supported by the system framework. You can update it in GetApps. Open GetApps now?"
"This passcode protects your passwords stored in the cloud. You won't be able to access them if you forget this passcode."
This passcode protects your passwords stored in the cloud. Enter your screen lock to set it as the passcode for Password manager.
"This passcode protects your passwords stored in the cloud. You've already set it when you turned on cloud sync for Password manager."
Enter at least %d digits and letters
All Password manager data stored in the cloud will be cleared after you reset the passcode. Reset anyway?
"Can't verify screen lock now. Set a passcode instead."
The screen lock you entered is incorrect
To be able to use Password manager, set a passcode. This passcode will allow us to verify your identity if you switch devices.
"Set successfully. You'll have to enter this passcode on other devices to be able to access the encrypted items."
"Couldn't connect to the network. Connect and try again."
Connection request timed out. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"Can't connect to network. To view this information now, go to %s."
Your device will lock if you enter too many incorrect guesses
Set a screen lock for this device to be able to verify it as trusted.
Confirm your screen lock to turn off Advanced data protection
"Verify this device's screen lock to be able to turn on Advanced data protection"
Confirm your screen lock to be able to verify this device as trusted
Select a device to verify its screen lock
Automatically report location info when the battery is low
Report location when battery is low
Back up items regularly not to lose anything important.

"To turn on Find device and Xiaomi Cloud services, %1$d paid SMS will be sent automatically.
When you switch SIM cards, %1$d paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages."

"To turn on Find device and Xiaomi Cloud services, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent automatically.
When you switch SIM cards, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages."

"To turn on Find device and Xiaomi Cloud services, %1$d international paid SMS will be sent automatically.
When you switch SIM cards, %1$d international paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages."
"Changes you make on this device will be synced to all your devices. To protect your account, we recommend that you turn off syncing for other devices when you're not using them."
Another device is modifying your Xiaomi Account. Verify your account now.
Does the Xiaomi Account ID: %s belong to you?
Another device is modifying your account
Sign in to your Xiaomi Account to reactivate Xiaomi Cloud.
"Don't sign in to your Xiaomi Account on public devices"
Another device is modifying your account
Did you recently modify your Xiaomi Account using a %s?
"Changes you make on this device will be synced to all your devices. To protect your account, we recommend that you turn off syncing for other devices when you're not using them."
Turn off syncing for other devices.
Turn off syncing for other devices associated with your account.
The password you entered is incorrect
Turn off syncing for other devices associated with your account.
Sign in to your Xiaomi Account

You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync photos, contacts, messages, call history, notes, and other data, locate your device, and share items with friends. This app needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Syncing items may require mobile data connection and turning on Wi-Fi.
Use Xiaomi Cloud to sync data, locate your device, and share things with friends.

You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync photos, contacts, messages, notes, recordings, and other data, locate your device, and share items with friends. This app needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Syncing items may require mobile data connection and turning on WLAN.

"If you turn off Find device, you won't be able to locate your device using this feature. People with whom you share location won't be able to receive updates on your whereabouts as well."

"Find device is associated with your Xiaomi Account. You need to set a password or enter the password you've set. Make sure you always remember your Xiaomi Account ID and password."
If your device is lost, sign in to i.mi.com on any other device to locate, remotely lock, or erase data on the lost device. View details.
If your device is lost, sign in to i.mi.com on any other device to locate, remotely lock, or erase data on the lost device. View details.

Protect your data even when your device is lost

WeChat recommends you to turn on Find device
Alipay recommends you to turn on Find device
Sign in to i.mi.com with your Xiaomi Account to locate and lock your device, mark it as lost, or erase data remotely. View details here.

"%1$d international paid SMS will be sent automatically to activate this service.

Connect to WLAN or change sync settings. Tap to change.

Sync your photos, contacts, notes, and more across all your devices.

"Locate this device even when it's not connected to the network and view the location of other offline devices.
Learn more"

"Locate this device even when it's powered off or not connected to the network, and view the location of other offline devices.
Learn more"
Turn on Offline location on this device to be able to view the location of other offline devices.
Turn this feature on to be able to locate this device or view the location of other devices when not connected to the network.
To protect the security of your data, verify this device as trusted before turning on Offline location.
"I don't know this device's screen lock"
Advanced data protection is on. Use security passkey to sign in instead?
"Use another device's screen lock or your security passkey"

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, contacts, notes, Browser settings, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, call history, and App vault across all connected devices.

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, contacts, notes, Browser settings, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, call history, and App vault across all connected devices.
Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use this app to sync your messages, contacts, notes, Browser items, cloud albums, music, calendar, blocklist, and call history to the cloud.
Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use this app to sync your messages, notes, Browser items, cloud albums, music, calendar, blocklist, and call history to the cloud.

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your contacts, notes, Browser settings, photos and videos, recordings, calendar events, and Blocklist items across all connected devices.
Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your notes, Browser settings, photos and videos, recordings, calendar events, and Blocklist items across all connected devices.

"Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices. Access the items you sync from any browser at i.mi.com.

To activate these services, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent. When you switch SIM cards, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Calendar:
For syncing events
• Accessing SMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing MMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Editing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Storage:
For saving items on your device (e.g. images and videos)
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use these services. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using our services.
"

"Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! "Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost. You can go to i.mi.com to locate, lock, or reset it.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, this service needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Location:
For locating your device and switching to Lost mode
If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use this service. You can always turn this service on and off in the Settings.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using our services.
"

"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost. Visiting i.mi.com allows you to locate, lock, or reset it.

%1$d international paid SMS will be sent automatically to activate this service. When you switch SIM cards, %1$d international paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, this service needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Location:
For locating your device and switching to Lost mode
• Send SMS:
For locating this device when it isn't connected to the internet
• Access device info:
For accessing phone number in order to locate this device when it isn't connected to the internet

"Welcome to Find device! You can use this service to locate, lock, or erase data on your device if it's lost. Visiting i.mi.com allows you to locate, lock, or reset it.

%1$d paid SMS will be sent automatically to activate this service. When you switch SIM cards, %1$d paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, this service needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Location:
For locating your device and switching to Lost mode
• Send SMS:
For locating this device when it isn't connected to the internet
• Access device info:
For accessing phone number in order to locate this device when it isn't connected to the internet
If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use this service. You can always turn this service on and off in the Settings.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using our services.
"
